thread.title: Russia says nearly 5,300 rebels left Syria's Arbeen for Idlib - RIA

title: Russia says nearly 5,300 rebels left Syria's Arbeen for Idlib - RIA
text:
March 29, 2018 / 6:23 AM / Updated 7 hours ago Russia says nearly 5,300 rebels left Syria's Arbeen for Idlib - RIA Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia’s defence ministry said on Thursday nearly 5,300 rebels and members of their families left Syria’s eastern Ghouta enclave on Wednesday, news agencies reported. FILE PHOTO: Rebel fighters man a checkpoint in al-Dana town in Idlib province after they captured the town from fighters from the Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant (ISIL), in Syria January 9, 2014. REUTERS/Abdalghne Karoof/File Photo 
Rebels left the town of Arbeen for the northern province of Idlib, according to the Centre for Reconciliation in Syria, a body run by the ministry. Reporting by Denis Pinchuk; Writing by Andrey Ostroukh; editing by John Stonestreet
